programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Shy Ballerina
programme.desc: Watson is accused of murder.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: A Scandal in Bohemia
programme.desc: In this first adaptation, scandal threatens a foreign power and Holmes is beaten by a woman's wit.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Dancing Men
programme.desc: Holmes helps track down the person sending threatening messages to a man's wife.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Naval Treaty
programme.desc: A clerk's career looks to be in jeopardy when a secret document in his charge is stolen.

programme.title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Musgrave Ritual
programme.desc: Holmes connects a school chum's family ritual with a butler's disappearance.

programme.title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Abbey Grange
programme.desc: Sir Eustace Brackenstall's wife tells Holmes she saw a gang murder her savage husband.

programme.title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Man with the Twisted Lip
programme.desc: A businessman disappears after his wife catches sight of him in an opium den.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Greystone Inscription
programme.desc: Millicent Channing comes to Holmes asking for help to find her fiancé, who has disappeared.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Laughing Mummy
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes helps one of Dr. Watson's old friends but in doing so uncovers a serious mystery.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Thistle Killer
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes helps Scotland Yard track down a killer who has been leaving behind three thistles.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Vanished Detective
programme.desc: When Sherlock Holmes disappears, Dr. Watson and Inspector Lestrade begin an urgent search.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Reluctant Carpenter
programme.desc: Pyromaniac blackmails.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Deadly Prophecy
programme.desc: People begin dying after a schoolboy writes their names on the church steps.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Christmas Pudding
programme.desc: When a serial killer is sentenced to death, he swears he will kill Sherlock Holmes first.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Night Train Riddle
programme.desc: After a fight with his father on a train, a young boy seems to have vanished into thin air.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Violent Suitor
programme.desc: An advice columnist turns to Sherlock Holmes to save a young woman from her crazed fiancé.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Solitary Cyclist
programme.desc: Young music teacher Violet Smith tells Holmes of her concerns over a mysterious cyclist.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: A Crooked Man
programme.desc: Holmes and Watson investigate the death of a man whose wife is accused of killing him.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Speckled Band
programme.desc: A woman asks Holmes for help after her stepfather moves her into her late sister's room.

programme.title: The Case-Book of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Master Blackmailer
programme.desc: More repulsive and venomous than any snake is the king of blackmailers.

programme.title: The Case-Book of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Disappearance of Lady Frances Carfax
programme.desc: Watson's encounter with Lady Frances Carfax brings Holmes rushing to the Lake District.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Jolly Hangman
programme.desc: A traveling salesman is found hanged in his hotel room, but Holmes doesn't believe it is suicide.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Baker Street Nursemaids
programme.desc: A baby, the son of a missing French scientist, is left on Holmes and Watson's doorstep.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Winthrop Legend
programme.desc: Legendary silver coins presage death.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Diamond Tooth
programme.desc: While walking along the banks of the River Thames, Watson finds a diamond tooth.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of Lady Beryl
programme.desc: Lady Beryl confesses to a murder committed at her home, but Sherlock Holmes doesn't believe her.

programme.title: The Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Three Gables
programme.desc: Thieves purloin the manuscript of a biography of a man who recently died.

programme.title: The Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Dying Detective
programme.desc: A man dies of a mysterious tropical disease on which his cousin - his heir - is the sole authority.

programme.title: The Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Golden Pince-Nez
programme.desc: Inspector Hopkins calls on Holmes to help solve the murder of young Willoughby Smith.
